content: I also learned to admire these chess players: Smyslov, Spassky, Karpov, Kasparov, Keres, and Carlsen. There are, therefore, twelve great chess players of my choice.
translations: ita:Ho anche imparato ad ammirare questi giocatori di scacchiï¹• Smyslov, Spassky, Karpov, Kasparov, Keres e Carlsen. Ci sono
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
